Home News NoiseFit Crew Pro smartwatch with 1.4-inch HD AMOLED display, Bluetooth calling launched...
  • News

NoiseFit Crew Pro smartwatch with 1.4-inch HD AMOLED display, Bluetooth calling launched in India: price, features

The smartwatch can be purchased via the company's official website and e-commerce platform Flipkart.

By
Vivek Singh Chauhan
-
Published On: June 22, 2023 | Last Updated: June 22, 2023
Highlights
  • The NoiseFit Crew Pro has been launched in the country as an affordable smartwatch.
  • The newly launched smartwatch is being offered in three colour options.
  • The NoiseFit Crew Pro comes with a 1.4-inch HD AMOLED display and 240×240 pixels resolution.

With an aim to gain more customers, homegrown consumer tech brand Noise has come up with a new NoiseFit Crew Pro smartwatch for Indian consumers. The all-new smartwatch has been launched for under Rs 2,500 and comes with a 1.4-inch HD AMOLED display, Bluetooth calling, and much more. Take a look at the price and features.

Show Full Article

NoiseFit Crew Pro price, availability, colours

  • The NoiseFit Crew Pro smartwatch has been launched at Rs 2,199 in India.
  • The all-new smartwatch can be purchased via the e-commerce platform Flipkart and the company’s official website.
  • The NoiseFit Crew Pro comes in three colour options – Classic Brown, Classic Black, and Jet Black.
Also Read

Alleged Nothing Phone (2) price, storage options leaked in Europe

Future Ola Electric scooters could come with helmet detection system

There might not be an iPhone SE even in 2024

NoiseFit Crew Pro features

  • Design: The NoiseFit Crew Pro smartwatch comes with a round dial with a metallic build, and a functional crown and offers a leather strap.
  • Display: The NoiseFit Crew Pro has a 1.4-inch HD AMOLED display with 240×240 pixels resolution.
  • Health features: The smartwatch can monitor your blood oxygen level (SpO2), heart rate sleep patterns, breathing exercises, and stress levels.
  • Bluetooth calling: The NoiseFit Crew Pro has BT v5.3 and is equipped with TruSync technology that has a single-chip BT calling feature for hassle-free calling.
  • Contacts: The newly launched smartwatch allows users to save up to 10 contacts and access recent call logs.
  • Battery: As per the company, the NoiseFit Crew Pro can last up to a week on a single charge.
  • IP rating: The smartwatch has an IP68 rating, which means it can be submerged in freshwater for up to 30 minutes at a depth of 1.5 metres and is dust-resistant.
  • Sports modes/ watch faces: The NoiseFit Crew Pro comes with more than 100 sports modes and watch faces.
